content: for the love of knitting here s a sweet little valentine something i m making for my knitting friends and i thought i d share it with you too who couldn t use just a little extra love in their knitting bag i used size 5 needles with worsted weight wool yarn totally optional loop will require a small crochet hook use a yarn needle to tuck in the ends long tail cast on 17 sts key set up row sts stitches a p2 k13 p2 sl slip as if to purl b sl 2 k 15 k knit c sl 2 p 15 p purl d sl 2 k 15 e sl 2 p 15 pattern row repeat 5x 1 sl 2 k1 make first loop k3 make second loop 3x k3 first loop 2 sl 2 p1 sl1 p3 sl1 3x p3 insert right needle into 3 sl 2 k1 sl1 k1 psso k1 k2 decrease 3x k3 third stitch down from the 4 sl 2 p 15 second stitch on left needle and knit to pull up end row a loop x sl 2 p13 k2 y sl 1 p1 psso continue with knit cast off until the last 2 sts second loop purl cast off 2 insert right needle into same stitch as before and optional knit to pull up a loop z use the last loop and chain 10 sts cut yarn and pull through last stitch secure ends light steam block admire your work make another for the love of knitting roberta rich designs 2023
